column5: A question from my friend Tom S. who wasn't able to log in: I enjoyed six fly-in Canadian fishing adventures in the 1970s and would like to have a repeat performance! Can anyone recommend a service out of either Fort Frances (Rainy Lake) or Kenora and relate a little information about any recent experience? Thanks in advance for your thoughts!
They are based in Vermillion Bay but checkout Wilderness Air https://www.wilderness-air-escapes.com/ 1 807-227-5473

Totally agree with narda on wilderness air.also check out clarkes outposts.i was recently up to one of their outpists on upper wapesi and the fishing was fantastic for both walleye up to 26"and northern pike,top notch equipment,honda generator that you cannot here and a great cabin.

Check out Hidden Bay Lodge! hiddenbay.com they put you up the night before the flight, great meal plan and equipment! Shaggy and Tim will put you on the fish! No connection with the lodge, just a satisfied customer!
Northern wilderness outfitters 12th trip in 12 years fantastic service and fishing If you can get in try Sessi, but all are great
